text: Moshe Efrati (1934 - 26 September 2020) was an Israeli choreographer. He was the founder and artistic director of the Kol Demama Dance Company, based in Tel Aviv.Dance with a Difference, Simon Griver, Israeli Ministry of Foreign Affairs, 1-1-1999 In 1996, he was honored with the Israel Prize. Efrati was born in Tel Aviv. Efrati died on 26 September 2020 at the age of 86."איש פרא מרתק, אינטלקטואל" — הרקדן משה אפרתי מת בגיל 86 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Choreographers Category:People from Tel Aviv
title: Moshe Efrati
